Browse the source code of qv2ray/3rdparty/QNodeEditor/src/NodePainter.cpp

1#include "NodePainter.hpp"
2
3#include "FlowScene.hpp"
4#include "Node.hpp"
5#include "NodeDataModel.hpp"
6#include "NodeGeometry.hpp"
7#include "NodeGraphicsObject.hpp"
8#include "NodeState.hpp"
9#include "PortType.hpp"
10#include "StyleCollection.hpp"
11
12#include <QtCore/QMargins>
13#include <cmath>
14using QtNodes::FlowScene;
15using QtNodes::Node;
16using QtNodes::NodeDataModel;
17using QtNodes::NodeGeometry;
18using QtNodes::NodeGraphicsObject;
19using QtNodes::NodePainter;
20using QtNodes::NodeState;
21void NodePainter::paint(QPainter *painter, Node &node, FlowScene const &scene)
22{
23 NodeGeometry const &geom = node.nodeGeometry();
24 NodeState const &state = node.nodeState();
25 NodeGraphicsObject const &graphicsObject = node.nodeGraphicsObject();
26 geom.recalculateSize(painter->font());
27 //--------------------------------------------
28 NodeDataModel const *model = node.nodeDataModel();
29 drawNodeRect(painter, geom, model, graphicsObject);
30 drawConnectionPoints(painter, geom, state, model, scene);
31 drawFilledConnectionPoints(painter, geom, state, model);
32 drawModelName(painter, geom, state, model);
33 drawEntryLabels(painter, geom, state, model);
34 drawResizeRect(painter, geom, model);
35 drawValidationRect(painter, geom, model, graphicsObject);
36 /// call custom painter
37 if (auto painterDelegate = model->painterDelegate())
38 {
39 painterDelegate->paint(painter, geom, model);
40 }
41}
42void NodePainter::drawNodeRect(QPainter *painter, NodeGeometry const &geom, NodeDataModel const *model, NodeGraphicsObject const &graphicsObject)
43{
44 NodeStyle const &nodeStyle = model->nodeStyle();
45 auto color = graphicsObject.isSelected() ? nodeStyle.SelectedBoundaryColor : nodeStyle.NormalBoundaryColor;
46 if (geom.hovered())
47 {
48 QPen p(color, nodeStyle.HoveredPenWidth);
49 painter->setPen(p);
50 }
51 else
52 {
53 QPen p(color, nodeStyle.PenWidth);
54 painter->setPen(p);
55 }
56 QLinearGradient gradient(QPointF(0.0, 0.0), QPointF(2.0, geom.height()));
57 gradient.setColorAt(0.0, nodeStyle.GradientColor0);
58 gradient.setColorAt(0.03, nodeStyle.GradientColor1);
59 gradient.setColorAt(0.97, nodeStyle.GradientColor2);
60 gradient.setColorAt(1.0, nodeStyle.GradientColor3);
61 painter->setBrush(gradient);
62 float diam = nodeStyle.ConnectionPointDiameter;
63 QRectF boundary(-diam, -diam, 2.0 * diam + geom.width(), 2.0 * diam + geom.height());
64 double const radius = 3.0;
65 painter->drawRoundedRect(boundary, radius, radius);
66}
67void NodePainter::drawConnectionPoints(QPainter *painter, NodeGeometry const &geom, NodeState const &state, NodeDataModel const *model,
68 FlowScene const &scene)
69{
70 NodeStyle const &nodeStyle = model->nodeStyle();
71 auto const &connectionStyle = StyleCollection::connectionStyle();
72 float diameter = nodeStyle.ConnectionPointDiameter;
73 auto reducedDiameter = diameter * 0.6;
74 for (PortType portType : { PortType::Out, PortType::In })
75 {
76 size_t n = state.getEntries(portType).size();
77 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
78 {
79 QPointF p = geom.portScenePosition(i, portType);
80 auto const &dataType = model->dataType(portType, i);
81 bool canConnect =
82 (state.getEntries(portType)[i].empty() || model->portConnectionPolicy(portType, i) == NodeDataModel::ConnectionPolicy::Many);
83 double r = 1.0;
84 if (state.isReacting() && canConnect && portType == state.reactingPortType())
85 {
86 auto diff = geom.draggingPos() - p;
87 double dist = std::sqrt(QPointF::dotProduct(diff, diff));
88 bool typeConvertable = false;
89 {
90 if (portType == PortType::In)
91 {
92 typeConvertable = scene.registry().getTypeConverter(state.reactingDataType()->id(), dataType->id()) != nullptr;
93 }
94 else
95 {
96 typeConvertable = scene.registry().getTypeConverter(dataType->id(), state.reactingDataType()->id()) != nullptr;
97 }
98 }
99 if (*state.reactingDataType() == *dataType || typeConvertable)
100 {
101 double const thres = 40.0;
102 r = (dist < thres) ? (2.0 - dist / thres) : 1.0;
103 }
104 else
105 {
106 double const thres = 80.0;
107 r = (dist < thres) ? (dist / thres) : 1.0;
108 }
109 }
110 if (connectionStyle.useDataDefinedColors())
111 {
112 painter->setBrush(connectionStyle.normalColor(dataType->id()));
113 }
114 else
115 {
116 painter->setBrush(nodeStyle.ConnectionPointColor);
117 }
118 painter->drawEllipse(p, reducedDiameter * r, reducedDiameter * r);
119 }
120 };
121}
122void NodePainter::drawFilledConnectionPoints(QPainter *painter, NodeGeometry const &geom, NodeState const &state, NodeDataModel const *model)
123{
124 NodeStyle const &nodeStyle = model->nodeStyle();
125 auto const &connectionStyle = StyleCollection::connectionStyle();
126 auto diameter = nodeStyle.ConnectionPointDiameter;
127 for (PortType portType : { PortType::Out, PortType::In })
128 {
129 size_t n = state.getEntries(portType).size();
130 for (size_t i = 0; i < n; ++i)
131 {
132 QPointF p = geom.portScenePosition(i, portType);
133 if (!state.getEntries(portType)[i].empty())
134 {
135 auto const &dataType = model->dataType(portType, i);
136 if (connectionStyle.useDataDefinedColors())
137 {
138 QColor const c = connectionStyle.normalColor(dataType->id());
139 painter->setPen(c);
140 painter->setBrush(c);
141 }
142 else
143 {
144 painter->setPen(nodeStyle.FilledConnectionPointColor);
145 painter->setBrush(nodeStyle.FilledConnectionPointColor);
146 }
147 painter->drawEllipse(p, diameter * 0.4, diameter * 0.4);
148 }
149 }
150 }
151}
152void NodePainter::drawModelName(QPainter *painter, NodeGeometry const &geom, NodeState const &state, NodeDataModel const *model)
153{
154 NodeStyle const &nodeStyle = model->nodeStyle();
155 Q_UNUSED(state);
156 if (!model->captionVisible())
157 return;
158 QString const &name = model->caption();
159 QFont f = painter->font();
160 f.setBold(true);
161 QFontMetrics metrics(f);
162 auto rect = metrics.boundingRect(name);
163 QPointF position((geom.width() - rect.width()) / 2.0, (geom.spacing() + geom.entryHeight()) / 3.0);
164 painter->setFont(f);
165 painter->setPen(nodeStyle.FontColor);
166 painter->drawText(position, name);
167 f.setBold(false);
168 painter->setFont(f);
169}
170void NodePainter::drawEntryLabels(QPainter *painter, NodeGeometry const &geom, NodeState const &state, NodeDataModel const *model)
171{
172 QFontMetrics const &metrics = painter->fontMetrics();
173 for (PortType portType : { PortType::Out, PortType::In })
174 {
175 auto const &nodeStyle = model->nodeStyle();
176 auto &entries = state.getEntries(portType);
177 size_t n = entries.size();
178 for (size_t i = 0; i < n; ++i)
179 {
180 QPointF p = geom.portScenePosition(i, portType);
181 if (entries[i].empty())
182 painter->setPen(nodeStyle.FontColorFaded);
183 else
184 painter->setPen(nodeStyle.FontColor);
185 QString s;
186 if (model->portCaptionVisible(portType, i))
187 {
188 s = model->portCaption(portType, i);
189 }
190 else
191 {
192 s = model->dataType(portType, i)->name();
193 }
194 auto rect = metrics.boundingRect(s);
195 p.setY(p.y() + rect.height() / 4.0);
196 switch (portType)
197 {
198 case PortType::In: p.setX(5.0); break;
199 case PortType::Out: p.setX(geom.width() - 5.0 - rect.width()); break;
200 default: break;
201 }
202 painter->drawText(p, s);
203 }
204 }
205}
206void NodePainter::drawResizeRect(QPainter *painter, NodeGeometry const &geom, NodeDataModel const *model)
207{
208 if (model->resizable())
209 {
210 painter->setBrush(Qt::gray);
211 painter->drawEllipse(geom.resizeRect());
212 }
213}
214void NodePainter::drawValidationRect(QPainter *painter, NodeGeometry const &geom, NodeDataModel const *model,
215 NodeGraphicsObject const &graphicsObject)
216{
217 auto modelValidationState = model->validationState();
218 if (modelValidationState != NodeValidationState::Valid)
219 {
220 NodeStyle const &nodeStyle = model->nodeStyle();
221 auto color = graphicsObject.isSelected() ? nodeStyle.SelectedBoundaryColor : nodeStyle.NormalBoundaryColor;
222 if (geom.hovered())
223 {
224 QPen p(color, nodeStyle.HoveredPenWidth);
225 painter->setPen(p);
226 }
227 else
228 {
229 QPen p(color, nodeStyle.PenWidth);
230 painter->setPen(p);
231 }
232 // Drawing the validation message background
233 if (modelValidationState == NodeValidationState::Error)
234 {
235 painter->setBrush(nodeStyle.ErrorColor);
236 }
237 else
238 {
239 painter->setBrush(nodeStyle.WarningColor);
240 }
241 double const radius = 3.0;
242 float diam = nodeStyle.ConnectionPointDiameter;
243 QRectF boundary(-diam, -diam + geom.height() - geom.validationHeight(), 2.0 * diam + geom.width(), 2.0 * diam + geom.validationHeight());
244 painter->drawRoundedRect(boundary, radius, radius);
245 painter->setBrush(Qt::gray);
246 // Drawing the validation message itself
247 QString const &errorMsg = model->validationMessage();
248 QFont f = painter->font();
249 QFontMetrics metrics(f);
250 auto rect = metrics.boundingRect(errorMsg);
251 QPointF position((geom.width() - rect.width()) / 2.0, geom.height() - (geom.validationHeight() - diam) / 2.0);
252 painter->setFont(f);
253 painter->setPen(nodeStyle.FontColor);
254 painter->drawText(position, errorMsg);
255 }
256}
